docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

Test entry part 1

docs.title: Scope & Models
docs.text:
This documentation is a structured, web-based adaptation of Toyota Service Repair Manual RM790E and related supplements for the 1KZ-TE diesel engine.

It is intended as a technical reference for inspection, diagnosis, service, and repair of the 1KZ-TE engine and its supporting systems.

docs.title: Covered Engine
docs.text: 1KZ-TE - Configuration: Inline 4-cylinder - Displacement: 2982 cc - Induction: Turbocharged - Injection: Indirect injection (prechamber) - Fuel system: Electronically controlled Denso VE rotary pump - Timing drive: Timing belt

docs.title: What This Manual Covers
docs.text:
• Engine mechanical systems
  • Fuel injection and electronic diesel control (ECD)
  • Turbocharging and emissions systems
  • Cooling, lubrication, and starting systems
  • Factory diagnostic and test procedures

docs.title: What This Manual Does Not Cover
docs.text:
• Vehicle chassis, suspension, or body systems
  • Automatic transmission internals
  • Market-specific wiring outside engine-related circuits
  • Non-factory performance modifications
